Traits.Name: Aura of Shielding
Traits.Description: The abjurer and adjacent allies have dodge.

Actions.Name: Cleansing Bolt
Actions.Effect: Allies in the area effect are immune to its damage and can save, ending a mark, status, or blight on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Empower Shield
Actions.Description: The abjurer reduces their speed to 0, but their aura of shielding increases to range 2 and also grants cover. They can exit this stance as an action, and also exit if shoved or stunned.
